tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="Based on:
http://www.fpsadmin.com/forum/showthread.php?t=13490
https://www.gametracker.com/games/cod4/forum.php?thread=97369" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2016-01-17 17:05:15" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-01-17 17:08:11" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_cmdlines.cmdline_default: +set fs_homepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set fs_savepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set dedicated 2 +set net_ip $[Service.IpAddress] +set net_port $[Service.GamePort] +set sv_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +set ui_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +set sv_punkbuster "1" +exec server.cfg +map_rotate
tc_game_cmdlines.cmdline_private: +set fs_homepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set fs_savepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set dedicated 2 +set net_ip $[Service.IpAddress] +set net_port $[Service.GamePort] +set sv_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +set ui_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +set sv_punkbuster "1" +exec server.cfg +map_rotate
tc_game_cmdlines.cmdline_default_custom: +set fs_homepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set fs_savepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set dedicated 2 +set net_ip $[Service.IpAddress] +set net_port $[Service.GamePort] +set sv_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +set ui_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +exec server.cfg +map_rotate $[Service.UserCommandLine]
tc_game_cmdlines.cmdline_private_custom: +set fs_homepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set fs_savepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set dedicated 2 +set net_ip $[Service.IpAddress] +set net_port $[Service.GamePort] +set sv_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +set ui_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +exec server.cfg +map_rotate $[Service.UserCommandLine]
tc_game_cmdlines.predef_cmdlines: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <ArrayOfPredefinedCommandLine xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <PredefinedCommandLine> <Id>e226af59-840c-4c47-8c20-585fc60029ef</Id> <CommandLine>+set fs_homepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set fs_savepath $[Service.UserDirectory] +set dedicated 2 +set net_ip $[Service.IpAddress] +set net_port $[Service.GamePort] +set sv_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +set ui_maxclients $[Service.Slots] +set sv_punkbuster "1" +exec server.cfg +map_rotate</CommandLine> <Description>Default</Description> </PredefinedCommandLine> </ArrayOfPredefinedCommandLine>

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
IF NOT EXIST __iw3mp GOTO CONTINUE1
attrib -h __iw3mp del __iw3mp
:CONTINUE1
IF NOT EXIST players\profiles\active.txt GOTO END del players\profiles\active.txt
:END
